content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Science Lab Network
Consists of 10 labs spread across the map at positions:
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5)
- Lab at (18.5, 3.5) 
- Lab at (11.5, 6.5)
- Lab at (23.5, 13.5)
- Lab at (8.5, 16.5)
- Lab at (3.5, 17.5)
- Lab at (10.5, 22.5)
- Lab at (15.5, 35.5)
All labs are connected to power network and contain various amounts of automation and logistic science packs

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5)
- Network of pipes connecting these components
- Electric poles connecting power to other structures
System is operational with steam engine working at full capacity

### Inserter Production Line
Located around (23.5, 2.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine crafting inserters
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5) containing 20 inserters
- Output wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)
- Two burner inserters at (21.5, 2.5) and (25.5, 2.5) moving items between chests and assembler

### Logistic Science Pack Production
Located at (32.5, 5.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine configured for logistic science pack production
- Connected to power network via electric pole at (30.5, 7.5)

### Smelting Area
Collection of furnaces:
- Furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at (4.0, 4.0)
- Furnace at (6.0, 4.0)
Most furnaces currently idle due to lack of ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into furnaces or boilers
- Keep track of iron plate production and inventory before attempting to craft items requiring iron plates

### Research Related Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to set it as research target
- Verify research prerequisites are met before attempting to start new research

### Assembly Line Errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting assembly operations
- Verify power connection status for assembling machines

### Power System Errors
- Maintain consistent fuel supply to boilers to prevent power interruptions
- Regularly check and fix steam pipe connections to ensure proper flow

### Inventory Management
- Verify item availability in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Monitor science pack levels in labs to maintain research progress
